headline: Personal Protective Equipment Company Evaluation Report 2025 | Honeywell, DuPont, and 3M Lead with Innovations Across Advanced Materials, Industrial Technologies, and Sustainability Solutions
summary: The Personal Protective Equipment Companies Quadrant offers an in-depth analysis of the global PPE market, detailing the top 12 industry leaders among over 112 companies evaluated. Key players include Ansell, Honeywell, 3M, DuPont, and MSA Safety. PPE is vital for protection against diverse hazards in high-risk industries and is driven by strict global safety regulations. Challenges such as supply chain issues and substandard products persist, while manufacturers focus on comfort and protection

headline: Integrated Cyber Solutions Appoints Veteran Data & AI Scientist Jeremy J. Samuelson to Cyber Future Advisory Board

headline: SmartSilk Corp. Announces Legal Filing Related to Unfulfilled Pandemic-Era PPE Order
summary: MONTREAL, Aug. 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- SmartSilk Corp., a Canadian company that actively supported urgent public health procurement efforts during the COVID-19 pandemic, has formally filed a legal claim in connection with a failed 2020 order for N95 respirators. In early 2020, as global demand for personal protective equipment surged, SmartSilk joined the worldwide effort to secure critical supplies for healthcare and front-line workers. Acting in good faith and under urgent conditions, the
